titleStmt.title: A commendation of musicke and a confutation of them which disprayse it.
titleStmt.author: Whight, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Aldersgate strete, by Alexander Lacy: dwellyng besyde the Well,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "When first within the corps of man, dame Nature built her bower:".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
